name: Nexiant
overview: Nexiant, Inc. provides maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) inventory management and outsourcing solutions for the industrial markets in the United States, Canada, and Mexico. The companyâ€™s Smart Inventory Manager enables multi-site inventory visibility to provide a view of the MRO supply chain to optimize purchasing, inventory management, and replenishment of materials. It provides Point-of-Use solutions, including Secure that manages dispensing items; Select, which enables users to visually locate required materials; SmartCrib that manages personal protective equipment and safety items; Crib, which controls access to store rooms, and manages inventory with bar-code scanning technology; Scan that manages open stock and moving items; and Source, which provides a single point of access to plant and/or enterprise-wide MRO inventory. The company also offers professional services, including advisory, implementation, managed, and support services; and training, program planning, and business services. It serves agricultural and heavy equipment, aircraft, automotive, construction materials, consumer products, defense, electronics, food/beverage, tool and die, medical devices, metals, mining, packaging, pulp and paper, textiles, and utilities/energy industries. The company was formerly known as DispenseSource, Inc. Nexiant, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Irvine, California. The company has regional sales, and services and support center in Novi, Michigan.
